content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory to craft the desired items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires both iron plates and iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
